extendedInfo.description: GradGuru is your free community college advisor in your pocket. Based on your school, GradGuru gives you the deadlines, tips, and personal guidance you need to finish community college faster. We help you find your way through community college to finish faster. Download us now and tell your friends! Need more detail? GradGuru helps you: --keep track of deadlines --better understand the milestones you need to hit --learn what proven behaviors lead to academic success --take advantage of existing student support and financial aid resources, and --share these lessons with your friends! If you can't find your school, send us an "unlock" email! GradGuru is GradGears.org's first product. We're a registered nonprofit whose mission is to increase and accelerate community college student success.Grad Guru  Grad Guru  Grad Guru  Grad Guru  Grad Guru  Grad Guru  Grad Guru  Grad Guru

reviews.title: Grad Guru is just what I need!
